pr_title: fix: revert changes which broke route registration

timeline.bodyText: Did this stop from working since we downgraded some version(s) or ?
timeline.author: pleku

replies.bodyText:
Apparently it never worked.
I don't know why it worked for me when I tried it.
May be it's related to the versions and then which version : bnd or OSGi container/depdencies.
I don't know.
Currently it doesn't work for sure. And in fact this is absolutely not important : one way against another is just a convenience. Stefan will hopefully find a reason and fix this minor thing. There are much more important things now.
replies.author: denis-anisimov
